trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The worried woman has a fuzzy wuzzy problem.
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_TODO_00<tab>Search for signs of the runaway cat.
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_TODO_01<tab>Chase down and catch the runaway cat.
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_TODO_02<tab>Return the runaway cat to the worried woman.
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_000<tab>Ah, you there! Have you seen a black cat nearby? She's wearing a red collar with a big bell attached.

TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_001<tab>We got separated during the upheaval the other day, but I spotted her in the area not too long ago! I tried to tell her there was nothing to be afraid of now, but she didn't seem convinced...
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_A1_000_001<tab>I'm afraid I haven't seen her...
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_A1_000_002<tab>Sounds like you could use a hand.
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_A1_000_003<tab>Meow!
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_002<tab>You haven't? In that case, if it isn't too much to ask, perhaps you'd be so kind as to help me look for her?
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_003<tab>Are you sure!? Oh, that would be wonderful!
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_004<tab>Did you hear that!? Is that you, my precious little fuzzy wuzzy!?
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_005<tab>Oh... Don't toy with me like that! To make up for that cruel joke, I think you should help search for her.

TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_006<tab>If I leave it any longer, I fear she'll get a taste for freedom and never come back! I'm sure you'll be able to coax her back, though. Please, your assistance would mean the world to me!

TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_007<tab>I sensed something in you the moment we met─I'm all but certain my little fuzzy wuzzy will take a liking to you! So, what do you say? Can I count on you?

TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_008<tab>Before you set off, there's something you should know: my little fuzzy wuzzy simply adores being chased. When you find her, be sure to play along and tire her out─she'll settle down soon enough. Anyway, I suggest you head to the plaza and take a look around!
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_009<tab>As I said, she loves being chased. You'll need to tire her out before trying to catch her! Good luck!
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>A black cat sporting a fetching red collar eyes you warily. This must be the missing cat you've been asked to track down.
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>She seems to have identified you as a worthy playmate. You might be able to catch her if you tire her out.
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Although you get the impression the cat has near-limitless energy reserves, you resolve to give chase.
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_SYSTEM_100_012<tab>Tire the cat out and then get close enough to swoop in and make your catch!
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>You can stop giving chase by leaving the area. You may try again by surveying the designated location.
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CAT05172_000_014<tab>Mmmeowww!
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_015<tab>How did you fare? Did you find her!?
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_016<tab>My little fuzzy wuzzy! Back at last!
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_017<tab>You must have given her quite the chase. She looks about ready for a catnap! Honestly, it's a relief to see her unharmed and healthy.

TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_018<tab>I'm from Tural originally, but I was stranded here after the barrier went up. It was this little scamp's grandma that helped me through those dark days after I realized I'd be unable to return home...
TEXT_KINGZG009_05172_CATWOMEN05172_000_019<tab>Indeed, I don't know where I'd be without all of my precious little fuzzy wuzzies. Thank you so much for your help!
